pull.title: ci: Run more ci configs on cirrus
pull.body: Now that cirrus ci runs more stable than travis ci, we can try to move more configs over there to see if any issues arise.

events.body: Concept ACK. Travis seems unstable even slow for now.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->
